## hueRgba variable

Converts a normalized hue to RGBA with given optional `alpha` value (default: 1).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hueRgba: (out: import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec | null, hue: number, alpha?: number) => import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec
```
